title.rendered: Colorado whitewater rafting enewsletter: get it!

content.rendered: Our August enewsletter went out Friday. Did you get it? It’s got all kinds of Colorado whitewater rafting information, fun info, news from the river industry and rafting trip discounts too!  If you’d like to be added to our email list, please let us know at info@coloradorafting.net. Read the August newsletter here for late-season deals on Arkansas River rafting trips and Colorado River rafting trips. We’ve still got awesome Colorado rafting trips!
